 OOC: Don't worry  :)
Perceptor::
The virus was stopped and computers  reported that  the virus was neutralized. Soon some Perceptor's memories will be erased and he would be ready to a reprogramation if Swichblade wished
 
  x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote: -- Switchblade --

Switchblade's mind grumbles as he detects the virus, or some sort of 
final protection. He wasn't surprised he'd tripped it after how 
quickly he'd been smashing around in Perceptor's head. 

Immediately, he scans the data flow of Perceptor's mind, and 
searches signs of a virus. Fairly quickly he picks up what he is 
looking for, it being executed not long ago, and he builds a fix. 
The fix is sent out, and it hunts down the virus and neutralizes it.

He proceeds to go back and he begins to remove key memories from 
Perceptor's mind; ones regarding any dislike towards him, and he 
removes them. This process shouldn't take too long, and he works 
quickly.

ooC: too damn late... =P


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Perceptor:
> The resistance was broken, but a hidden virus was activated. If 
Swichblade couldn't destroy it, this virus would destroy Perceptor's 
spark... an might destroy Swichblade's
